There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around August 16th 2001
divs: sighting details aprox. 8:50 p.m. walking the dog w\ my daughter-we were looking at the sky. i was pointing out the differences betweensatelites and stars, when i saw what i first thought to be a plane, fairly highin the horizon, due south. it was moving very slowly, (like a plane far away)or maybe it wasnt moving at all. this all happened in a split second so imnot sure of what i saw first, the movement or the size, anyway, i realized thatthere were three amber colored lightsevenly spaced, parallel to each other, andthere seemed to be a soft glow between the lights. it still appeared to greatdistance away, i would guess 10 miles or more. i dont really have anyreference to judge night air distances. there was no sound. as soon as iregistered the size it shot across the sky (about one tenth of a 180 degreehorizon) and then it was gone.
